vacancies.title: Senior Gutter Installation Specialist
vacancies.description: We are looking for an experienced gutter installation specialist to join our team. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience in residential and commercial gutter installation. You will be responsible for leading installation projects, training junior technicians, and ensuring the highest quality standards are met.
requirements: 5+ years of experience in gutter installation
Strong knowledge of different gutter systems and materials
Ability to work at heights safely
Ability to read blueprints and technical drawings
Physical fitness and ability to lift heavy materials

vacancies.title: Gutter Repair Technician
vacancies.description: Join our maintenance team as a gutter repair technician. You will be responsible for diagnosing and repairing various gutter issues for our clients. This role requires excellent problem-solving skills and a customer-focused approach.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in gutter repair
Knowledge of various repair techniques and materials

vacancies.title: Sales Representative
